alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 9:02PM PST until December 15 at 2:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 2 AM WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Expect damage to trees and power lines as well. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches between 5000-7000 feet, with locally higher amounts up to 3 feet in the Riverside County mountains and 3 to 4 feet in the San Bernardino mountains above 8000 feet. * WHERE...Mountains of San Bernardino and Riverside Counties above 5,000 feet elevation. * WHEN...4 AM Tuesday to 2 AM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
